name: Slipwood
description:
Slipwood.

It is a truth universally acknowledged that a ghost lost in the slipwood must be in want of the light. The light, and a way home.

So they say.

~ ~ ~

Click on the game to begin. Arrows or WASD to move. Or click/tap in the direction you want to move. 

M to mute sound, R to restart a level.

12 levels in all. Should take about 10 or 20 minutes to play? Unless you get stuck. But you can't die. You're a ghost.
